text: Tinkomboleche kunchelewasya jwamunsachile mwa wanganyao, ni kunkumbatisya kukwenu jwamunsachile. Sano naga n’di munsachilile ajula jwamum’bisile pambali tipawe pangali ulemwa kukwenu (kunkumbatisya kukwenu). Yalakweyo ni yakuwandichila kuti meso gao gatetewale, nambo soni kuti akadandaula, ni ayisengwele yamwapele wanganyao wanaose. Sano Allah akumanyilila yaili m’mitima mwenu, ni awele Allah Jwakumanyilila nnope, Jwakutulala nnope ntima
